question:
Consider the following:
  1. Marrakesh Accords
  2. Clean Development Mechanism (CDM)
  3. Intended Nationally Determined Contributions (INDCs)
  4. Common but differentiated responsibilities
 Which of the above are related to Kyoto protocol?
explanation: Intended Nationally Determined Contributions (INDCs) is related to Paris Agreement. Under the Paris Agreement, adopted in December 2015, the INDC will become the first Nationally Determined Contribution when a country ratifies the agreement, unless they decide to submit a new NDC at the same time. Once the Paris Agreement is ratified, the NDC will become the first greenhouse gas targets under the UNFCCC that applied equally to both developed and developing countries
